inn1.comm: full but drifts on Guptill's pads, pings off it towards fine leg for a couple of extras to set the ball rolling
pushed towards midwicket by Guptill. Rather full, with not much swing
shortish length on middle and leg, clipped to fine leg. Not much swing so far
full and wide outside off, a testing line. Left
gone! Latham nicks off. Pradeep has the wicket. Keeps it on a terrific area, just outside off. Latham plays defensively and gets a thick outside edge, which is easily taken. Lovely start for SL.
back of a length on off, Guptill stands back and defends towards cover
back of a length outside off, Guptill tries to thrash a cut over point but the ball steeply climbed past the outside edge. Did not bother keeping that down
good length on off, lovely lines but not much swing or seam movement. Blocked
that is a good run. Back of a length on off, Guptill plays it with soft hands towards gully for a run. Important to keep ticking it over in tough conditions
fullish on middle, nurdled towards midwicket
wonderful run. Just worked with soft hands towards midwicket and sets off immediately, makes the run easily
skids through. Good length on off and middle, the ball hurries onto KW who misses his flick and is struck high on the pad
good delivery and equally well played. Full, nipping back in late towards off stump. KW watches the movement and closes any gap between bat and pad to quell towards the slip cordon
nice and full, straight too, forcing KW to defend
what a shot. Overly full outside off from Pradeep, KW drives with elegance through mid-off.l Top-quality straight drive hurries through mid-off for four. Already making it look easy
not quite timed well enough. Short and wide, KW flays a cut through extra cover. Did not get all of it
good stroke. Back of a length on off, KW stands tall to punch to mid-on.

lands safely for MG. Fullish outside off, Guptill scurries down the track and looks to clear the infield with a lofted cover drive but the ball skews off the outside half and goes high in the air, but lands a few feet in front of third man
pushed to cover
super shot. On the up, through extra cover. Good length outside off, Guptill drives and gets four for it. Exemplary timing
worked off his hips towards midwicket to get off strike
punched off the back foot to mid-on for a quick run. Knew what he was doing, wasn't a bad delivery at all
good end. Full on off, a touch of away movement. Squeezed to point
lovely lines. Full but jags back in towards off stump, KW is forced to watchfully defend
nice and full again, not much swing. KW defends under his eyes
overly full on off, pushed to mid-on
full outside off, Williamson leans into the block. Very good over so far
half-volley outside off, Williamson drives delectably to mid-off
jags back in very late. Excellent over. Good length, the ball swerves back in late to strike KW very high on the thigh
back of a length on off, pushed defensively towards mid-off
a slight bit of width, but not enough. Good length, and wide-ish. Punched to cover
another solid punch to cover. Back of a length outside off, Guptill stands tall to play
128 kph, full outside off, Guptill stays in his crease and tries to punch through cover but he look to hit it too hard. Did not time it at all
good length outside off, slapped off the front foot to mid-off with a cross-bat

superb shot. Lovely timing. Very full outside off, and that was Guptill's cue to go over the infield. lofts the drive very easily over mid-off for a massive six. Excellent batting, saw the opportunity after 5 dots
ah, great shot. Lets the ball come to him before deflecting it off his hips to the square leg boundary. Ensured he did not hit it too ard but let the timing do the work. Good shot
watchfully defended towards point
good length on off and middle, clipped off his pads to midwicket.
naughty flirt. Fullish outside off, KW is in two minds and ends up poking at one, beaten. Poor stroke
laid into that, alright. Full but too wide, KW square-drives with superlative timing to the point boundary. Eight runs off two bad balls in this over. Consistency important for these quicks
that is better. Good lines, fullish on off. Blocked
lovely run. With all that power, the infield goes deeper in the circle, Guptill mid-times his drive to mid-on and gets an easy run

not quite short enough but Williamson is in some form. Shortish outside off, KW rocks back and swivels through the shot to get the pull in the gap through midwicket. Not a terrible delivery, but it's four
good from Perera. Keeps it on a good length, and brings it back towards KW who clips to midwicket
back of a length on off, KW hurries back and gets on his toes to punch to mid-off
full again on off, blocked
good length on off, KW turns this powerfully to mid-on. Decent over from Thisara
good length on middle and leg, nudged to mid-on

that may have just tickled into the boundary. Very full on off and middle, Guptill launches  a lofted drive, high over mid-on. But he has got more elevation than distance, the ball plonks into the surface and goes towards the boundary. Pulled back just in time, but his foot was over the boundary and touching the rope while in contact with the ball
pushed defensively into the off side
shortish on leg, picked off to short fine leg and Williamson calls him through.
strays down leg, wide
nice and full, just short of a half-volley. Defended to cover
that is just terrific batting. Good length on off, pushed with soft hands towards mid-on. Waited for the ball to pass the bowler and then called with intent for one. Made it easily.
dabbed easily to third man. Williamson starting to turn the strike over with a lot more ease
too short and that will be four. Back of a length on off and middle, Guptill swivel-pulls through and gets the gap behind fine leg for another boundary
the runs coming with enviable ease. Shortish outside off, Guptill thrashes a ferocious cut through extra cover. Four more
hmm, interesting shot. Full on off, Guptill backs away and looks to smash the ball over mid-off, doesn't get under it , drills a drive
back of a length on off, blocked
slower ball on leg, pushed towards wide mid-on for a quick ringle
low full toss to start, Guptill drills a drive to mid-off again, Mathews runs across and keeps it in
good length on off, punch-drive to mid-on
nice delivery. Fullish, coming back in. KW can do nothing with that but block
poor delivery now. Drifts on Williamson's pads who flicks off his pads to fine leg
Guptill backs away and tries to clear mid-off, NK delivers a terrific yorker. Blocked
a lot of shots from Guptill. Full on off, he squeezes a drive to long-on. Not required just yet
back of a length on off, pulled to deep square leg
back of a length on off, gets Williamson hopping in his crease as he finds mid-on
shortish length on off, clipped to midwicket easily for one
bouncer, good variation. Guptill hurriedly ducks
back of a length on middle, turned to midwicket
another short delivery on off, Guptill misses his pull and is struck on the arm, the ball rolls off to point
too short, sits up for KW to pummel a pull to midwicket for two easy runs
good length outside off, checked drive to mid-off. May have just stopped in the surface
full outside off, chopped to third man for one
shortish outside off, pulled powerfully to deep square leg
another pull. NK goes short gain, KW rocks back to execute another pull shot to deep square leg
drifts on the pads, worked but straight to short fine leg
nudged to midwicket
shortish outside off, ramped to third man with the open face
guided to third man for one more. Nice, these two in control at the moment
too straight from Chameera, tickled fine to the fine leg fielder
shortish length, banged in but doesn't get up at all. Worked away with a cross-bat to deep square leg
another ball which is too straight, KW picking off runs at the moment. Whipped to deep square leg
slower ball maybe outside off. Played quietly to point
Williamson tickled this off his pads to fine leg
nicely done. Full delivery on off, Guptill gets a good forward stride and then steers the ball to third man off the outside half
125 kph, full on off, blocked
nice lines, 126 kph. Good length on off, Williamson cannot do much with that. Pushed to mid-on
dabbed to third man for another single
tossed up on off, Williamson hurries down to clip to long-on with the turn
way too short. Easy runs. Drags one down on leg, Guptill gets down early and smashes the pull through square leg for an easy boundary
drilled to long-on with the turn
slightly shorter on off, KW stays in his crease before executing a punchy drive to long-on
almost got through but Guptill does well. Shortish on middle, the ball keeps a tad low.Guptill uses his hands well and hits the pull through deep square leg. Good fielding at the boundary too.
tossed up, defended towards cover
KW shuffles across to flick to deep square leg. A tad short from Kulasekara
not too full but Guptill drives powerfully, finds cover though
clears one foot and looks to make a shot through cover. The ball skids onto him, driven to cover
129 kph, very full on off, Guptill drills the drive back to Kulasekara who fumbles and allows the run.
short and wide, Kw shuffled across to guide to third man
full and wide, a flayed drive to deep cover
leans forward and drives into the cover where the fielder dives to his right to stop the ball
hit hard off the back foot but can't find the gap at cover point
played into the covers again
drags it short this time and Guptill pulls to deep square leg
tossed up on off and middle, Williamson drives smoothly to long on
punched off the back foot to cover, Guptill played four dots in that over
played off the back foot to deep cover
driven back to the bowler from the crease
full ball on the pads, Guptill unleashes the sweep to get to his fifty, he begins 2016 like he ended 2015
driven on the front foot to long off
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
a long hop outside off stump, Williamson looks just a touch ungainly as he drags it with a flat bat through midwicket
goes back to cut but that ball was too close to off stump so he bottom edges it into the ground on the off side
steps out this time and drives the ball through midwicket for two more
goes back and plays the ball through wide mid-on
Guptill stays in his crease and hits the ball to long off
tries to close the face and to play on the leg side but the outside edge goes towards extra cover for a single
nudged through midwicket for one more
a filthy full toss and Guptill winds up and pulls the ball to the midwicket boundary to bring up the century partnership, off 115 balls. That was such a freebie
played off the front foot to cover
goes back in his crease and punches a flatter and faster ball to long on
pushed back to the bowler on the front foot
driven to long off for another run
Guptill drives firmly too but can't beat extra cover
shot! Williamson goes inside out, skipping down the pitch and lofting the ball over cover for four
played off the back foot to cover, the fielder jumps to collect
the Kane Train rolls past another half-century with a punch off the back foot to long on
Guptill goes back in his crease and pushes to long on too
defended on the back foot towards the leg side, Dilshan fields himself
a back foot drive to long on, seven runs off the over without a sweat broken
and there's another one, Raff! At waist height. Williamson lofts it over mid-on off the front foot, did not time it well but it will do
cut off the back foot through point for a single
played from the crease to mid off
gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep square leg
gets on to the front foot and defends, wasn't to the pitch of that one to play a forceful shot
tapped off the back foot towards long-on for one more

shot! Incredible placement through the infield, between two fielders at cover. Williamson jumped down the pitch, but was not to the pitch of the ball. He adjusted by waiting, hanging back until he was able to drive through the gap

Williamson falls to a really poor ball! It was so short and down leg side as well, might have just bounced a bit more, is all. Williamson went back to pull but seemed to be cramped for room and ended up gloving it. Chandimal juggled it a little down leg side before taking the catch. I think that went off the bottom part of the glove, bounced off Williamson's thigh, then bounced off the keeper's thigh before finally landing in his gloves.
driven through cover for a single
played to long on for a single
defended on the front foot
driven to long off for one more
defended from the crease towards point
steps out and drives the ball towards mid on
defended back to the bowler
Guptill goes over mid-off, driving the full ball flat and hard, clearly the infielder comfortably, there's a long off too though
driven through midwicket for a single
punched towards wide long off for a single
Taylor moves back and across to play that fast-hands cut of his, but can't beat point
nudged off the front foot towards mid on
goes back into his crease and punches to long off
stays in his crease and pushes a flat and straight ball to long on for one more
goes back again and this time brings his bat down quickly to defend on the leg side
a shorter ball down leg side, Guptill gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep square leg
Guptill plays the big drive but can't beat cover, didn't time it well
after a couple of those full tosses, Siriwardana sends down a rank long hop, Guptill rocks back and pulls the ball powerfully, that's in the stands beyond midwicket
driven into the covers
tossed up outside off, driven into the covers again
pushed just a little wide of the cover fielder for a quick single
driven off the front foot but there's a fielder in the way at short cover
worked off the pads to a man stationed at short midwicket
played off the back foot to short midwicket again
leans forward in his crease and nudges the ball to the right of the man at short midwicket, the fielder is quick to prevent the single though
this time he does get the ball past short midwicket, to the left of the fielder towards long on
punched off the back foot through cover
goes back and cuts the ball from right in front of his stumps to point
good length just outside off, Taylor hangs back and opens the face to run the ball towards third man
short of a length at the body, Guptill drops the ball close on the off side off the back foot
gets behind the line of a good length ball on off and middle and defends
short ball, Guptill gets on his toes in his crease, front leg in the air as he pulls along the ground to deep square leg
defended on the back foot towards cover
Taylor seemed to try and turn the ball on the leg side too early, he was already well through the shot by the time the ball arrived and had to defend that awkwardly in the end
driven on the front foot to cover, Guptill is not hitting the gaps as often as he would like
sweeps down to long leg for one more
nudged off the pads past short midwicket for a single, NZ get to 150
short ball, Guptill goes back into his crease, winds up and pulls along the ground, does not find the gap on the boundary
played towards mid-on off the back foot, Dilshan runs across and fields
driven between the bowler and short midwicket for a single
defended from the crease on the off side
a terrific cut shot and a terrific dive on the backward point boundary from Kapugedera saves the four! Taylor went back and brought his bat down in a flash to cut that ball from close to off stump
nudged off the back foot on the leg side, short of a length delivery
Guptill made room to try and play on the leg side but got an inside edge on to his boot on the off side
short of a length outside off, Guptill jumps back and pulls on one leg through square leg
that bouncer was too high, Taylor bailed out of playing a shot, it's a wide for height
short of a length on the hips, tucked down to long leg for a single
stays in his crease and cuts the ball from close to off stump, can't beat the point fielder though
driven off the front foot to long off
leans forward and drives to long off again
Guptill picks off the fourth single in the over with a drive to long on
five in five now, Taylor steps out and pushes the ball towards long on
and that completes the set, Guptill collects a single to long off with a front foot drive
Was that an edge? Think it was off the thigh. Yes, leg byes. Guptill tried to work the short of a length ball towards fine leg but didn't make proper contact
short of a length outside off, Taylor cuts, but can't find the gap through the infield
this time he's found it! Cutting it a little late to place the short ball behind the fielder at point, the timing is so great that third man has no chance
jumps back to defend the short of a length ball with a straight bat, no room this time
good length with a little nip into Taylor, who drives off the front foot towards mid off
worked off the pads to midwicket
nudged off the front foot to point, a dot to begin Dilshan's final over
punched off the back foot to long on
gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep backward square leg
played off the back foot to short midwicket
played back to the bowler on the front foot
defended on the back foot to short midwicket

Guptill backs away towards the leg side and aims for the booming drive down the ground, the ball goes down the ground all right but behind the batsman, the outside edge flying just wide of the wicketkeeper and screaming to the boundary
in the blockhole around off stump, dug out on the off side for a single
waits in his crease for a length ball opens the face to guide it to third man
tries to pull but the length is not short enough and he gets a bottom edge into the ground towards the leg side
a slower ball on a good length around off stump, Guptill drives from his crease and finds cover
another slower one, Guptill works the ball off his pads through midwicket and has time to come back for the second
short of a length outside off, Taylor jumps back and dabs towards point
pushed towards mid on for a single

whoa! That's a flat-batted pull right over the bowler's head and over the straight boundary! Guptill backs away towards leg side and just mows the short ball with a flat bat, won't find that in any coaching book
short of a length outside leg from around the wicket, Guptill goes back and pulls to deep backward square leg
Taylor tries to turn the ball on the leg but misses and is hit on the pad
pulled to deep square leg for a single
very full on off and middle, Guptill squirts a drive to deep square leg
a touch shortish outside off, guided to third man with the open face
punched from the crease to deep cover. Guptill wanted two but the fielder was quick on it.
a tad too wide, Taylor chops another one down to third man to give MG the strike

doesn't matter how he got it, but that is No. 10 for Martin Guptill. What a sensational counterattacking punch this has been. Good length outside off, he looks to punch through covers but gets a very thick outside edge which flies to the third man boundary.
ooh, wanted to clear the boundary. Slower ball on off, Guptill backed away but mis-timed his hoick to midwicket
full but straight, Taylor finds cover with his drive
good tight bowling, length on off and Taylor can only pat towards midwicket
missed opportunity. Good length on middle, Taylor looks to clip to the leg side but misses.
gets a hold of it this time. And the power and placement means it is an easy boundary. Short delivery on leg, Taylor pulls emphatically through backward square leg with great timing
tight. Good length on off, nudged to midwicket

picks the gap again. A bit full on middle, and this time, after missing one previously in the over, he laces the flick with exemplary timing to the backward square leg boundary. The acceleration has begun

gone. Guptill holes out. Looking to go over the top but he squeezes it off the inside half of the bat, lodges down long-on's throat. Nothing delivery from Kulasekara, in the slot for the big shot but Guptill did not get it at all
tucked off his hips towards backward square leg for a run
nicely driven through cover. Overpitched on off and Nicholls opened the face of the bat nicely
good length on off, a thick inside edge rolls towards the leg side via the pads
123 kph, not much pace for NK. Shortish on off, flat-batted towards midwicket
125 kph, full outside off. Pushed to cover
good length on off. Nicholls chops one over the stumps and to the keeper
steered to third man with the open face
full on off, slapped to cover
not timed at all, but he picked his gap. Full on off, in the slot again. Taylor shuffles across in trademark Rosco style and wallops the ball over midwicket, plonks towards the boundary.
off the inside edge, towards point. Rosco has to scamper to make his ground at the non-strikers end
pushed defensively towards mid-off
very full on middle, Taylor clips to deep square leg after moving across
very short bouncer, loops over the batsman's head.
goes for another short bouncer. Not as high as the previous one, but too high for cricket legality. Another wide
fullish and wide, chopped to point on the bounce
lovely line, banged in on a good length on off. Nicholls punches off the back foot to cover

Nicholls holes out now. A few dot balls and Nicholls feels like he needs to have a go. Again, the ball was right in the slot and Nicholls crunches the swipe, but doesn't time it well enough. Skied but straight to deep midwicket. A slight change in momentum at the moment.
nice run. Fullish but wide outside off, Taylor drives towards mid-off for a hurried single
nicely bowled, went wider of the crease and pitched the ball on a good length. Left Ronchi late and beat him
very full and wide, Taylor lashes a drive through cover but just one
superb shot. Got on top of the bounce but hit it over point. Shortish delivery outside off, and Ronchi picked his spot well
good length outside off, the ball climbs steeply but Ronchi lets it be
tip and run to point. Good length outside off, Ronchi uses soft thands
drilled to mid-off for one
steep delivery from a back of a length, Ronchi gets high on his toes to steer a cut to the sweeper cover
guided to third man off the outside half of the bat
126 kph, full and straight, worked to deep square leg
lovely stroke. Low full toss from Kulasekara, Ronchi just times the drive with exceptional power to the long-off boundary.
back of a length outside off, punched to mid-off
chipped to midwicket off the inside half
back of a length outside off, pushed to long-on for a run
shortish length on leg, whipped to square leg
Rosco drives the fuller delivery to mid-off for another run
what a shot that is. I'm not sure it was intentional though, shortish delivery outside off. Ronchi wants to pull but withdraws his bat quite late and the ball ramps off the bat over the keeper. Four
steered away off the open face to third man
fullish on off, patted to cover
another overly full delivery on off, pushed to long-on
low full toss from Kulasekara, drilled to long-on
tight delivery on off, defended back
oh that is huge. Picked his slot, waited for the ball and executed to perfection. Full outside off, Taylor gets across and crashes the heave well over the midwicket boundary. Fifty for Rosco too.
very full delivery outside off, ramped to fine leg
goes for that yorker but doesn't quite get it, pushed to long-on
nice yorker on of, dug out back to the bowler
tickled off his hips to square leg
sensational yorker on leg, Taylor walks across but gets it through his legs for the boundary to fine leg. Got his front foot out of the way
swatted to deep midwicket

very full down leg, sliding down leg. Big appeal and Mathews goes for the review, he has nothing to lose so he goes for it. But that's sliding down. Full on leg, Ronchi missed his flick. No bat involved. Hawkeye shows umpire's decision on stumps, just clipping.
drifts well down leg, another extra
slower ball outside off, a swat-pull to deep midwicket
nicely bowled, slower ball on leg. Ronchi goes for the drive but the ball grips in the wicket and lobs towards cover
starts off with another low full toss, poor bowling. Ronchi pummels the drive past the bowler and the stumps, scurries to the long-off boundary
looking for that yorker again, clipped to deep midwicket

gone. Taylor slog-sweeps but straight to deep square leg. Another slower ball on middle, Taylor goes for the swipe but like many before him, Taylor fails to connect as well as he would have liked. Big wicket
slapped to deep midwicket. Fullihs delivery on off and Ronchi goes for the slog
good length outside off, a thick outside edge goes to third man
a touch too full but Ronchi can only squeeze to long-on
slower ball down leg, Ronchi shuffles down the pitch and makes room but misses
nicely done. Slower ball on middle, swatted to deep midwicket with terrible timing, helping him get two
slogged to deep midwicket again
fast and full on middle, smashed to midwicket
nice bowling, yorker on off. Dig back with startling power to the bowler who fumbles and allows the run
slower ball outside off, creamed to deep point for another single
yorker on off, dug out towards mid-on with such bad timing that they got through for two
swiped on the bounce to deep midwicket. Excellent bowling, very full on leg
terrific execution. Yorker on middle, nothing Santner can do but push to long-on
and again, 128 kph. Yorker on middle, dug out tot long-on
good running, but this bowling is quite terrific. Very full yorker outside off, squeezed towards long-off but they get through for two
full on middle, skewed to deep square leg
just splendid. Yorker outside off, patted back
and almost nails that yorker again, speared in the blockhole outside off, smashed to long-off
one more yorker. Ronchi finds long-on. Amazing bowling, he has hit it three in three so far
finally, Pradeep misses. Low full toss outside off, looking for that yorker again. Santner wallops the ball high and over long-off.
another low full toss on off, Santner thrashes a drive to long-on, Ronchi races back for the second

oh, that is big. Santner scores 14 of the last three balls to take NZ to 294. Pradeep missed his length and ended up as a half-volley. Belted with a lot of power over long-on. Went deep into the stand

inn2.comm: nice start. Good length and swinging away quite late, DG plays it down defensively
goes wider of the crease, Gunathilaka pushes the length delivery towards mid-on
lovely bowling. Pitched up, inviting the ball to swing. Pushed into the cover region
good length on off, DG looks to force the ball on the up but mis-times his drive to cover
uppishly flicked. Strays on leg does Boult and Gunathilaka clips off his pads to square leg
beautiful shot. Boult bangs one in short on middle, Dilshan swivel pulls with so much ease to the backward square leg boundary.
full delivery outside off, Gunathilaka looks to drive exuberantly but can only hit to mid-on
shortish and wide, chopped towards point
short again but much wider. Gunathilaka flays a cut after getting on top of the bounce. Races to the point boundary
shortish down leg, wide called.
full again outside off, steered to third man with the open afce
nice and full on off, Dilshan strides forward and squeezes a drive towards deep square leg. he was looking for two but the fielder was quick on it
nice delivery to end. Full but slightly wide, not much swing for Henry. Left alone
129 kph, fullish outside off, Dilshan drills a drive on the up to mid-off.

Boult strikes. Full delivery outside off, Dilshan looks to scoop it over short fine leg, but gets a top edge. Terrible stroke considering it was a returning Boult. The keeper takes it and Boult is rightly overjoyed. Dilshan wanted to put the pressure on Boult, but the gamble did not pay off at all
worked off his pads towards deep midwicket. Nicely played, waited for the ball to come to him
shortish on off, placed towards midwicket with soft hands for one
full on middle, 135 kph. Thirimanne inside-edges to square leg. One more
Boult goes wider of the crease, pitches on off at a good length, watchfully defended

bowled im. Thirimanne goes. Big wicket for NZ. Thirimanne has shown impressive resolve on this tour but his ODI series has come to and end. Slightly wider outside off but not wide enough to throw his hands at it, a thick inside edge clatters into the stumps. Too close for the cut.
back of a length to start, clipped off his pads towards midwicket to get off the mark
four streaky runs. Full on middle, honing in on that lbw. Gunathilaka gets a thick inside egde which races away past short fine leg
good delivery. Full outside off, with a bit of bounce. Left alone
watchfully let go again. Very nice lines from Henry
nice stuff again from Henry, fullish on middle and turned to midwicket where Henry gathers and throws the stumps down at the non-strikers end.
cracking shot. Full and wide, Chandimal gets down on one bent knee and unleashes an elegant drive but straight to mid-off
fortuitous runs. Full and wide outside off, Chandi wanted to dab to third man but the ball bounced a touch extra and took the outside edge, third man is too square and that will be four
another thick outside edge, all along the ground to third man
fullish on a fifth-stump line, Gunathilaka steers to point
132 kph, nice delivery. Wider of the crease but zoning in on off stump. Blocked
135 kph, good length on off, Gunathilaka looks to punch but a thick inside edge goes towards deep square leg
poor lines, full and quick but down leg
full on off, Gunathilaka defends to cover
back of a length outside off, nice speed - 139 kph. Gunathilaka looks to cut but the ball swerves away and bounces extra
fuller than a good length on off, pushed to cover
fullish on middle, another block ensues
superb stuff all around. Very full outside off, and Gunathilaka laces a lovely square drive where Guptill makes an excellent diving stop
except for the wide, it was a terrific over. Full outside off, squeezed to point
lovely pace, 142 kph. Sliding down leg though and Chandi clips easily to midwicket
full on off, Chandi presents the full face of the bat to block
145 kph, nurdled off his pads towards deep midwicket for  a relatively easy couple
really full on off, driven with decent timing to mid-off
147 kph. Milne's pace increasing as he gets into the over. Pushed to mid-on
149 kph.  Impressive stuff from Milne. Fullish outside off and driven to extra cover with a half-foot forward
139 kph, nice length. Just on off and Gunathilaka is forced to block
back of a length outside off, Gunathilaka looks to punch off the back foot but the ball takes the inside half of the bat towards point
shortish and wide, guided to point
picked off his pads to deep square leg
full outside off, an inside edge towards square leg
rather full again on off, drilled to mid-on
146 kph, full on middle. Hustling Gunathilaka for pace, driven towards mid-on
147 kph, hits that good length on a fifth-stump line, guided past point for a comfortable brace
146 kph, too full on middle. Tucked to mid-on
that is good, Milne banging away at a consistent length outside off. Guided defensively off the front foot to point
troubling length that. Just full of a back of a length on middle, properly defended
strays down leg this time, pings off the thigh pad towards square leg for an extra

Gunathilaka goes. After a very patient start, he goes for a big slog. Kept his shape though and picked a good stroke, but did not connect at all. Got it off the toe-end and Sodhi at mid-on settles under the skier to send the opener back. Was a rather full delivery outside off, and Gunathilaka got under it too early and was through the shot, thereby taking the toe.
full outside off, Chandi goes for the exotic drive from the crease, without feet movement. Got a thick insdie edge onto his pad
got his foot to the pitch better this time, driven to cover
tries to bludgeon it again. Very full and wide outside off, Chandi looks to drive on the up but a thick inside edge rolls to square leg
defended from the front foot
extremely good over. Persistent lines and lengths from Henry. Full on off, no room for Chandi forcing a block
143 kph, good start again from Milne. Firs it full on off, Mathews walks across and awkwardly defend
149 kph again, full but drifts down leg. Wide
147 kph. Hustles Angi for pace. Back of a length on middle Mathews is very late on his flick and gets a thick inside edge onto his pad
146 kph, blocked off the front foot watchfully
full and straight, Mathew walks across and turns to square leg
beautiful lines these. Nothing much any batsman can do, full on off. Mathews pushes to mid-on defensively
lovely shot. A tad short and wide, Mathews opens the face quite late and steers it past point for a brace
back of a length on leg, swerves in to beat the inside edge of Chandimal
shortish outside off, inside-edged through square leg
overly full outside off, nudged to mid-on
full on off, Mathews executes another forward defensive block
lucky. Full, very full outside off. Mathews looks to power a drive through mid-off but gets a thick inside edge which just misses the stumps and careens into the fine leg fence
smashed to mid-on from the front foot
149 kph again, full on leg though and smoothly tickled to square leg
141 kph, very wide. Too much bounce. Dug in on a shortish length on off, Mathews hurriedly gets underneath
defended off the front foot
shortish length on leg, Mathews lets the pace come to him before deflecting to fine leg for a run
nurdled off his pads to fine leg
145 kph, shorter length down leg. Mathews avoids it
whipped off his hips to fine leg
nice start, floated up on off and Mathews watchfully keeps it out
slightly quicker and flatter on middle, Mathews goes back to quell
too short and wide, powerfully cut to point
slowed up on off, Mathews wants one with a soft drive to cover but Guptill is quick on it
patted back
flat on off, Mathews hurries back to punch back to the bowler
floated up outside off, nicely driven with the spin to the sweeper cover
beauty. Flat outside off, extracts plenty of turn to rip one past Mathews' outside edge
flat outside off, Mathews skips down to whack back, Sodhi dives but cannot stop the single after fumbling
flat on middle, looked a good appeal if there was no bat. Chandi looks to sweep but the ball takes the glove.
flat on leg, tickled fine towards fine leg
flatter on off and middle, patted away
poor ball. Rank long hop on off, Mathews is grateful for the opportunity and wallops the pull with a lot of power over midwicket
turned towards square leg for one
lovely stroke, allows the flighted delivery to come to him before opening the face of the bat to guide towards cover
pushed to cover
nice end. Flat on off, Mathews lunges forward to defend
flat on middle and leg, Chandi presses forward to defend
very flat and quick on off, Chandi rocks back to punch to cover
tossed up now outside off, Chandi exuberantly drives to mid-off
flat outside off, but the legspinner still generates plenty of spin. Beats the outside edge
the face of the bat has been opened to guide the ball through cover for one
googly on middle, easily picked from Mathews and tucks this to square leg with discernible use of the wrists
nicely slowed up outside off, played down to cover
slightly too flat on middle, Mathews strides across to help it on its way to fine leg
lots of air on that, Chandi advances to drill to long-on
flat on off, Mathews comes forward but improvises well after misjudging the length
punch-driven to cover off the back foot
tossed up on off, Mathews keeps it out
flatter delivery on leg, strikes Chandi on the pad

what a shot that is. A lot of exuberance, and fraught with risk. But he is richly rewarded. Switches hands and goes for a reverse sweep/switch hit, connects with the low full toss beautifully through third man
nicely done by Boult, direct hit from square leg but Chandi has made his second run. Nicely whipped off his pad
pushed to mid-=off with soft hands and goes through with the run immediately
flat on off, blocked
very flat outside off, Mathews rocks deep in the crease to tuck to midwicket against the spin
overpitched outside off, drilled to long-off
nicely bowled, flat after seeing the advancing Mathews. Pushed back
shortish but wide, nicely punched to deep cover where there is good fielding. Boult and latham do well with some rally fielding
flat on off, cut to point
too wide outside off, very flat. Left alone
back of a length on off, defended watchfully under his eyes
lovely shot, just picked off his pads to fine leg uppishly. Latham does well
nice stroke, clipped neatly off his pads over midwicket and Chandi forces Mathews through for the second
good length outside off, lovely running. Steers the cut past point and immediately calls for the second. Makes it easy.
nice delivery, banged in short outside off. The ball climbs sharply but Chandi sways out of the line
guided to point who does well with a good diving stop
tucked neatly off his pads but straight to midwicket
nudged on the leg side for a quick single
shot! Gets down on one knee, moving his front foot across the stumps and sweeping powerfully to the deep backward square leg boundary
played carefully on the off side
dabbed close on the off side with soft hands for a really quick single to bring up the 50 stand
defended back towards the bowler
played down to long on off the front foot, seven runs off the over
144kph, played into the covers for another quick single, Santner does not hit the stumps
good length just outside off, 147 kph, Chandimal stays back and opens the face to play towards third man
banged in short, and that flies over the batsman's head, it's still climbing as Ronchi leaps to collect it above his head
Guptill dives to his right at point to take the pace off a firm cut shot

that's been ramped for six over third man! Chandimal waits in his crease for a short of a length ball outside off and then just lets the ball bounce off the middle of his bat, angling the face such that the ball soars over the boundary
nudged into the leg side from the crease
slower ball to end the over, defended on the off side
goes back into his crease to hit the ball through cover point
cut off the back foot to point
defended back to the bowler
swept hard but not good contact, the ball goes along the ground through square leg
Mathews makes great contact with the sweep! Pressing forward, getting down on one knee and sweeping hard to the backward square leg boundary. He passes 4000 ODI runs with that shotd
driven to long off for a single
played back to the bowler on the front foot
steps out and drills the ball hard and straight, that's four once it beats mid-on
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
cut off the back foot, plays it late past slip but not past short third man
dabbed into the covers for another stolen single, they beat Guptill no less
pushed through the covers for a single to end the over
angles a full ball into the right hander, driven on the front foot just wide of mid-off for a single
over the wicket and angles the ball across the right-hander, played off the back foot to cover
slower ball on a wicket to wicket line, Mathews plays it back to the bowler but Boult fails to stop it, should have prevented the single there
pushed off the back foot on the leg side, towards mid-on
cut hard off the back foot but Guptill is in the way of the speeding ball at point
good length angling into off stump, defended on the off side
steps out of this crease to the pitch of the ball and lofts it over the head of mid-on, the fielder gives chase and reaches the ball just inside the long-on boundary
gets down low and across his stumps to lap-paddle the ball past the keeper towards fine leg
shot! Comes out of his crease again to get to the pitch of the delivery and flick-whips it over the infield at midwicket
driven on the off side, but not wide enough to prevent Sodhi from moving quickly to his left and fielding
driven to long off for a single
driven into the covers, not in the gap this time
good length on middle and off, defended from the crease on the off side
that's slanting too wide outside off stump from over the wicket, Bowden calls it a wide
short of a length pitching outside leg, pulled in front of square for a single
defended back to the bowler, Boult went around the wicket for that delivery
that's a mis-hit but it falls safe! Chandimal went to hoick the ball over square leg but got a top edge that lobbed safely and fell inside the circle
Mathews charges the slower ball, makes room by moving towards leg and slaps the ball hard and flat to mid-off, reaches the fielder on the first bounce
defended on the off side, Boult ends an economical over
Chandimal telegraphed his intention to paddle sweep far too early, the googly hits his pad outside off stump
nudged off the front foot to mid-on, they run one before Henry can get to the ball and prevent it
clipped off the pads through midwicket, Mathews wanted the second but Chandimal had settled for one by sauntering the first
defended back to the bowler
a full toss, Chandimal meets it with the charge and lofts the ball over mid-on, he hasn't hit it well enough to clear the boundary though, bounces a couple of times
another full toss, Chandimal square drives along the ground through point to bring up his half century, he needs to carry on for much more for Sri Lanka today

that's gone really high in the air, really high, and when the ball descends it lands in Williamson's hands. Chandimal had a real hard hoick across the line at a good length ball and ended up slicing it high but not very far towards mid off
pushed off the front foot towards mid off for a single
full and straight, driven firmly to mid off
short arm pull to midwicket for another single
the slower short of a length ball sits up outside off, Mathews swats it to deep midwicket
Mathews gets to his fifty too, with a swat towards square leg, Sri Lanka desperately need him to stay the course
good length outside off from over the wicket, Mathews leans forward and defends
the short ball, Mathews shapes to play it but then lets it go above his head, that's a wide
defended on the back foot on the pitch, Henry runs across to field

Mathews was gone by yards had Guptill hit from point! He had cut the ball hard into the ground towards Guptill, who parried the ball towards cover point, the batsmen began to run after the fumble but then hesitated and stuttered between the wickets, Guptill missed at the bowler's end with Mathews barely in the frame
glanced to fine leg for one more
pushed towards midwicket
played on the back foot towards point
nudged close on the leg side for a single, Ronchi runs towards short midwicket to collect the ball
Perera mows the ball hard and flat towards cow corner, Latham does really well to run across from deep midwicket and dive to prevent the boundary
Perera takes Latham out of the equation this time, rocking back to heave the short ball far over the deep midwicket boundary
driven to long off for a single this time
played back to the bowler on the front foot
bowled flatter and quicker, nudged off the pads on the leg side
Mathews jumps out of his crease and drives the full ball straight, and really hard. Both the bowler and the umpire get their shins out of the way as the ball screams past
beats the outside edge with one that just nips away from the right-hander, Mathews was poking from his crease

short ball, Mathews pulls, hitting the ball really well off the front foot, it's Latham again at deep midwicket, diving full stretch along the ground and pulling the ball back in time, releasing the ball just before he goes over the boundary
guided to third man for one more
short of a length and straight, Mathews plays a short-arm swat to long leg
a length ball outside off, Perera hacks it through point for a single
punched off the back foot to long on for a single
tries to reverse hit the ball hard through point but misses and is hit on the pad outside off
pushed off the front foot to long on for a single
a big appeal for lbw after Perera is beaten on the slog and gets hit on the pad, that was missing leg stump
riven to long on for a single
steps out but then pushes the flat ball past midwicket, only four runs off the Williamson over
short of a length on leg stump, pulled down to fine leg where Boult makes the tumbling save

gone! Perera clears his front foot and slogs at a length ball angling across him from over the wicket, he's in no position to play such a shot and ends up slicing the ball high in the air, Taylor at cover calls for the catch and takes it easily
shot first up. Good length outside off, a nice punch drive to deep cover
good length outside off, Mathews plays it quietly towards cover for a quick run.
slower ball on middle and leg, 116 kph. Worked away towards deep square leg
nice change in length. 140 kph, goes for a short bouncer. Pulled ferociously to fine leg for one
flat on off, drilled to long-on
quick, on middle. Lovely placement through midwicket for a couple. Good running from Mathews as well.
driven with the turn to long-off
Mathews goes for the reverse. Good shot selection, but doesn't get all of it. Extra cover makes a good diving stop
pushed to long-on
races down the track to heave the ball to deep midwicket.
slower ball @ 121 kph but strays down leg
nice delivery. Good length on off and Mathews plays it defensively into the off side
142 kph, steered with the open face to third man. A call of "no" from the non-striker but the ball evaded point, enabling the easy run
big hit. Timely hit. Six runs. Good length outside off, Siriwardana stays in his crease and pulls the ball emphatically with a lot of power. Whistles into the stands
defended into the off side
Mathews just about made it to the other end. Shortish length on off, Siriwardana goes for the pull again to deep midwicket
six more. What striking this is. Shortish length again and Siriwardana lays into that pull shot. Clears the midwicket boundary comfortably again
around the wicket, good length on off, pushed to cover
exceptional shot. Mathews skips down the track, and flat-bats the pull with enormous power to the long-on fence.
very full and wide, free run for SL
nice run. Good length on leg, Mathews tickles it fine to short fine leg
lovely yorker. Outside off, inside-edged into the ground, to the keeper
seven of the over. Not a bad result for SL. Fullish on off, driven powerfully to long-on
superb running, just helped towards square leg. Mathews races back for the second. And just about makes it.
lovely shot. Sodhi flights outside off, Siriwardana stays in his crease and lofts the drive easily over mid-off. Four more, pressure on NZ
googly on off, defended under his eyes
85ks, flat on leg, MS dances down to clip to long-on
shortish and wide, Mathews flays a cut to Nicholls at point who makes an excellent stop
direct hit and MS was gone, I feel. Googly outside off, chopped to KW at cover who fires it in at the non-strikers end but misses
lovely shot. Goes over the packed off side infield, towards long-off for a couple
goes full and quick on middle, a thick inside-edge to square leg
beautifully done. Just made it look so easy, Mathews nudges the yorker with soft hands towards midwicket and hit with the right pace for two
poor delivery. Short down leg, pulled to fine leg
good delivery. MS gives himself room but tries to smash it hard, ends up inside-edging it onto his pad
sliced past point for another couple. Very full and wide

four to end the Powerplay, finish it with just the result they would have wanted. picked his shot again and executed well. very full on off, MS drives powerfully over the bowler's head for another boundary.
lovely shot. Flat on off, Mathews rockets the sweep to square leg
superb batting. he knows exactly what he is doing. Santner bowls it flat on middle, MS executes a cheeky reverse sweep past third man for a vital boundary
flat on off, turned to midwicket
Mathews trying to play it with soft hands for a couple but it was a low full toss, ended up inside-edging it onto his back leg as he left the crease. Luckily for him, it did hit that leg

big wicket. Flat on leg, Siriwardana unleashes an uppish sweep and to be fair, the shot was there to be played. However, he did not get under that enough and the ball just spooned up for Nicholls, at backward square leg, to take. Big catch, taken low to the ground
belted with enormous power. Low full toss on middle, Kapugedara runs down and thumps it back but it ricochets off the stumps to cover
flat outside off, steered to third man
lovely bowling, floated it up but wider outside off. CK runs down and drives with the turn to long-off
very flat again on middle, Mathews stays back and bunts the ball to deep midwicket
dances down the track and clobbers the flighted delivery to long-off
dot to end. just 3 of the over. Flighted again outside off, Mathews runs down and hits the ball back
slightly quick er through the air outside off, pulled to long-on
fired in outside off, pushed to cover
very quick on off, 96 kph, swatted to long-on. Just the one
slowed up nicely there, 85 kph. Mathews goes for the slog sweep but misses. Just misses off stump
turned to deep midwicket, Mathews wants two but won't get it
just enough flight on it for Kapugedara to get under it and clear long-on with ease. What a hit that is. 91-metre hit.
lovely delivery. Good change in pace and length. Short on off, Mathew sis very late on the pull
slower ball outside off, chopped away to the sweeper cover. Mathews into the 90s

gone! Sensational catch from Milne. Short delivery on middle, Kapugedara goes for the pull, gets a top-edge which goes miles in the air. Milne runs around from fine leg after losing it in the low light. He covers the ground, gets there, sees it late and holds on to a pressure catch.
shortish and wide, oops, should have been smashed. Mathews finds point
very full outside off, squirted off the inside half to long-on
slower ball at 114 kph to finish, drilled to long-off.
flat outside off, Kulasekara goes for the slog sweep but misses
reverse lap attempted. Overpitched outside off, and he misses. Big dot
that was very clever bowling, saw Kulasekara coming and bowled it slow and short outside off, Kula adjusts well and plays it towards cover
another reverse sweep. Gets down and pummels it, cleared up by the sweeper cover
flat on leg, darted in. Whipped to deep midwicket

six. Kulasekara finds the boundary. Precisely what SL needed to finish that over. Slog-swept on one bent knee, just clears long-on. Did not seem like he got it but Boult could not leap over the boundary to throw it back in
quite a high full toss outside off, but below the waist. Pushed to long-off
slower ball. Kulasekara winds up and goes for a massive swipe, ends up hitting to long-on
short delivery but slides down leg, extra run for SL

taken. Henry Nicholls has taken another pressure catch. Mathews perishes, how big is that? Short ball on off, Mathews executes a lovely pull but just did not get as much as he would have wanted. It travels high in the air and Nicholls settles himself at the square leg boundary, takes a catch over his head. Would have gone for six had he not got a hand on it. The bat face just turned in his hands
full and wide, an inside-edge to the keeper
another inside-edge towards short fine leg, one run

bowled im. Could that be the final nail in SL's coffin? Slower ball outside off and draws the third consecutive inside edge. this time it smashes into the stumps and Henry has a much deserved five-for.
very fast down leg, Kulasekara gives himself room but cannot connect with his attempted lofted drive
thick inside edge to deep midwicket. Kulasekara refuses the single.
well bowled. Sees NK moving across to try and ramp over the leg side but he fires it very wide but just inside the tramline. Dot.
just over cover. Clears his front foot, gives himself some room and just about manages to get under it to clear cover. Four more
yorker on leg, tickled to square leg. He'll take the run now
low full toss on middle, swatted to cover
Santner takes the catch as NZ close out the series 3-1. Low full toss outside off, Kulasekara goes for a lofted drive but skies it up without timing, Santner runs back from cover and takes the catch.
